name: Search for IPUs
descr: Marks segments containing speech activity in the audio recording and silences. Requires an audio file. Produces an annotated file with the silences vs sounding segments.

options.text: Window size to estimate rms (in seconds)
Threshold of the volume value (rms) for the detection of silences, 0=automatic
Minimum duration of an IPU (in seconds)
Minimum duration of a silence (in seconds)
Systematically move at left the boundary of the beginning of an IPU (in seconds)
Systematically move at right the boundary of the end of an IPU (in seconds)
